Package org.jcvlib.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KernelOperation
    Interface for implement linear and nonlinear operations.
    ParallelValueOperation
    Interface for execute code in many workers for independent values (pixels and channels).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Color
    This class contains all color values of some pixel.
    Histogram
    This class contains methods for manipulate image histograms.
    Image
    Main class for all images that used into the JcvLib.
    JCV
    Contains common useful constants and methods.
    Point
    Contain (x, y) position on image.
    PointQueue
    Contain (x, y) positions on image.
    Region
    Region is a structure that contains some characteristics of image region.
    Size
    Contain [height, width] size of image, rectangle or something else.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Extrapolation
    Contains extrapolation methods.
    Interpolation
    Contains interpolation methods.
